Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors

Deprecated Fields
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.convert.ColorConverter.DEFAULT_COLOR_FORMAT_PATTERNS
          use getDefaultColorFormatPatterns() 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.webapp.UIXComponentELTag.DOCUMENT_CREATED_KEY
          Not used any more in the session state manager 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.context.Agent.PLATFORM_MAC
            

 

Deprecated Methods
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.change.ChangeManager.addDocumentChange(FacesContext, UIComponent, DocumentChange)
          use ChangeManager.addDocumentChangeWithOutcome(javax.faces.context.FacesContext,javax.faces.component.UIComponent,org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.change.DocumentChange) instead 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.SkinFactory.addSkin(String, Skin)
          use SkinProvider SPI to deal with externals skins Implementing SkinProvider and exposing skins using SkinProvider#getSkin() method is recommended than using this API to make skins available at runtime. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.component.UIXComponentBase.broadcastToMethodBinding(FacesEvent, MethodBinding)
            
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.component.UIXCollection.clearCurrencyStringCache()
          Have your Renderer implement ClientRowKeyManagerFactory and create your own ClientRowKeyManager instances. Then you can manage the lifecycle of each key inside your ClientRowKeyManager. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.context.RequestContextFactory.createContext(Object, Object)
          This method does not work in a Portal environment. It will only work with a ServletRequest. Please use RequestContextFactory.createContext(ExternalContext) which is container agnostic. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.util.Base64OutputStream.finish()
          use the close() method instead. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.util.ExternalContextUtils.getCharacterEncoding(ExternalContext)
          replaced by an API in JSF. Use ExternalContext.getRequestCharacterEncoding() 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.util.ExternalContextUtils.getContentType(ExternalContext)
          use ExternalContext.getRequestContentType() 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.component.UIXCollection.getCurrencyString()
          use getClientRowKey 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.context.LocaleContext.getIANALocaleString()
          use getFormattingIANALocaleString() 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.context.LocaleContext.getLocale()
          use getFormattingLocale() 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.context.RequestContext.getProcessScope()
          use getPageFlowScope() 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.util.ExternalContextUtils.getRequestContextPath(ExternalContext)
          use ExternalContext.getRequestContextPath() as of JSF 1.2. This method does not appropriately handle portlet environments, but the functionality is maintained to prevent needing to change the contract. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.SkinFactory.getSkin(FacesContext, String)
          use SkinProvider#getSkin method to query skins 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.SkinFactory.getSkin(FacesContext, String, String)
          use SkinProvider#getSkin method to query skins 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.SkinFactory.getSkin(FacesContext, String, String, String)
          use SkinProvider#getSkin method to query skins 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.SkinFactory.getSkinIds()
          use SkinProvider#getSkinMetadata to get the list of skins supported 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.SkinAddition.getTranslationSourceValueBinding()

          not implemented. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.util.ExternalContextUtils.isAction(ExternalContext)
          replaced with ExternalContextUtils.isRequestFromClient(ExternalContext) 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.model.RowKeySet.isContainedByDefault()
          remove asap 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.model.RowKeySetTreeImpl.isContainedByDefault()
          do not use. this will be removed post Tier 1. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.Skin.isDirty()
          use isDirty(boolean checkAncestorSkins) instead. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.Skin.registerStyleSheet(String)
          Use addSkinAddition(SkinAddition) instead. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.skin.SkinFactory.reload()
          use SkinProvider SPI to deal with externals skins this functionality will now be replaced by having the SkinProvider implementations reloading skins themselves as and when required. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.config.Configurator.reloadSkins(ExternalContext, SkinFactory)
          use SkinProvider SPI. The reloading of 'dirty' skins has to be taken care inside SkinProvider implementations. 
org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.component.UIXComponentBase.setAttributeChangeListener(MethodBinding)
